reviews.review: Что я могу сказать, игра довольно не плохая, если её не покупать. То что твориться сейчас, вряд ли можно назвать игрой. В каждой катке (на высоких рангах) постоянно попадаються маньяки с порчями на генератор или ноед. Что действительно делает игру не интерестной. А разработчики делать вообще ничего не хотят. Что бы выпустить патч с фиксом прозрачных маньяков и сурвов, постоянных бесконечных загрузках в лобби и прочее, они просто добавляют нового маньяка который является имбой в данное время, а его еще пофиксить хотят. На счет баланса в игре я вообще молчу. Каждая новая карта вселяет в меня ужас, каждый раз когда захожу на карту всегда ищю палетки и места для мансов, место того что бы искать и чинить геник. Вобщем разрабы вместо нормального патч-фикса выпускают DLC с какой-то хуетой. А как совет покупать или нет решайте сами, стоит оно того или нет.

A lot of bugs and glitches. It's just impossible to play. Every new update - new problem.
Space sometimes is not working when you want to skip first clip before game launches. Always getting disconnects for no reason. And when someone disconnects from game before it starts - everyone stacked on loading screen. I writing this review exactly after this incident. I am tired of this schit. I am losing items and add-ons just because of disconnects. And funny fact is, that sometimes their website is not working when you want to submit a ticket. And yes, I have stable Internet and I live in Europe.
They started event yesterday and I play few games - didn't get points for it. Next day they fixed that bug, but I still don't have event points for my games.

あまりにもひどい現在の環境でさすがに黙っていられなくなりました。

まず今回のイベントmoonriseは史上最悪です。
キラーはBP、サバイバーはイベントポイント。
前回のハロウィンイベントは最低限この差があるから成立していました。
ですが今回はそのどちらもサバイバー有利。
しかもオファリングをわざわざ使ってもボーナスBPは1.5倍期間より低い。
こんな状態で誰がキラーやるんですか？
これじゃ「サバイバーができないから仕方なくやる」罰ゲームですよ。
ノルマも多すぎで完走なんぞさせる気はなく、足りない分を課金で買わせる意図が見え見えです。

イベントだけでなく、システム的な問題も多数。
足跡が天井やオブジェクトに吸われて足元に出ないバグを始めとして何かするたびにバグが増えます。
イベントのポイントが入らないなんてテストすらしてないのですか？
バグはどんどん増えるばかりで更新も一か月単位がザラ。
少数スタッフだから無理？もっと少数のインディーズメーカーのほうがまだ対応が速いですよ。
新しいことをやる前に足場がぐちゃぐちゃになっているのをなんとかしてください。

そして最悪なゲームバランス。サバイバー優遇にも程がある。
修理時間が短すぎてキラー側は開幕から遅延できる「呪術：破滅」なしではやってられないのに
有能の証明を強化して修理速度を上げるパーティサバイバーを優遇する調整。
加えて理不尽パーク決死の一撃を調整すると言って半年放置、ハッチ閉めも放置。
そして「満足いく調整ができなかったから調整なし」？
段階的に調整とか行動する余地は十分あるでしょう。口だけならなんとでも言えるんですよ。
プレイヤー人口の最大派閥がパーティのサバイバーだからと
多数派優遇に走って少数派を切り捨ててはゲーム崩壊一直線です。
実際今はサバイバーのマッチングが非常に悪くなってます。
何のうまみもないキラーなんて誰もやりたくないんですよ。
むしろ、損な役割だからこそ最低限報酬は多くするのが当たり前でしょう。
ゲームコンセプトは良いのに、肝心のゲーム部分がおざなりすぎです。

そして運営は衣装を売れば売り上げが増えることに味をしめています。
衣装を増やしやすいような4人組キラーを出してきたのもそれが一番の理由でしょう。
衣装に課金することは運営の衣装優先を助長するだけだと悟りましたよ。

Want an unfair gaming experience where survivor is easy mode and killer a buffoon to be taunted in 90% of cases ? Look no further dead by daylight is for you!

Game is unblanced as fuck, some perks are mandatory and requires lot of grinding to unlock on characters, most of them wotn be used by anyone, there's very real little choice in builds . Worth mentioning you pay for the base game and extensions yet you still have to pay more for skins. Another cash grab for kids.
It's not so much fun anymore, ,many  bugs and  unbalances, the core issues from the beggining are still there years later as devs are lazy wankers. At high ranks the game will last less longer than the average waiting queue and players will be so toxic all you will want is to derank. Was fun before but as for now avoid, your money will be better spent elsewhere.

Dead By Daylight é um Jogo Com Mecânicas simples de aprender, Assim como todo o jogo tem seus altos e Baixos, infelizmente grande parte dos personagens do jogo (assasinos e Sobreviventes) estão apenas presentes em DLC's, e não podemos ignorar o fato de que os desenvolvedores se apressaram para lançar um Beta do jogo, pegando a ideia do recém anunciado (na época) Sexta Feira 13 o Jogo, um dos pontos mais negativos do jogo é o "Sobreviva com Amigos" pois pessoas que tem um canal de áudio fechado disponível, como Skype ou Discord obtém uma vantagem enorme e Injusta sobre o Assassino!

The game is highly recommended for all types of gamers. The playstyle is totally differet from the basic online multiplayer games, making it a very atteractive new playstyle experience. But there are a lot of bugs in the game. Some of the major ones are:
1. If I use an offering as a survivor and the host disconnects before connecting to game I lose the offering.
2. If the host disconnects in the match survivors do no get the rank points. On higher ranks survivors get negetive ratings also.
3. The global matchmaking server causes joining with hosts with over 800-900 ping also. (major drawback)

And, the game is recently flooded with wall bot users. so they can easily know the location of everyone in game.

Still i do recommend the game to everyone :) its highly enjoyable, espically with friends and the community is great too :)

面白いかどうかはマッチングしたプレイヤーによる
運営は悉く無能。詳細は後述

☆評価点☆
・唯一無二と言っていいゲーム性
ホラーを題材にしたゲームであり、スリルと悪役側の気持ちを味わえる
・豪華なコラボ
バイオハザードやホラー映画のハロウィーン、悪魔のいけにえなどの名だたる名作などからゲスト参戦してる
・雰囲気重視
元がホラー要素の強めのゲームであるため、雰囲気もホラーチックになっている

☆問題点☆
・運営が無能
真面目にテストプレイしてるかどうか疑問符がつくバグや仕様がかなり多い上に運営の行動にも問題点があり、失言も多い
・仕様上、生存者側が有利
パーティープレイが可能であるため、仕様上生存者はVCPTが多く、殺人鬼でプレイ中に当たると全滅は難しくなる
・民度が低い
DbD全体の民度は総じて高くない、むしろ低い。懐中電灯や屈伸を使った煽りは日常茶飯事であり、リザルト画面のチャットでも煽りが飛び交うことがある。

シンプルなルールが受けている面もあるので難しい問題です。まあ十分楽しんだので卒業してもよいでしょう。
игра отличная

So... I bought the game a week ago before travelling and i got 2 complete different experiences: before and after the Rank Reset. Before the reset, i was able to see how good this game is! Is adicting, is thrilling, is spooky is wathever good thing someone more creative can say, is a good game!
 But then i travel for a week, return, and when i boot the game the Rank Reset just hit and i quickly saw a glaring problem, that being me having nothing at all going against people that have pretty much everything in their inventory and being called for not being good. This for me makes the game very new player unfriendly and actually encourages new player to limit their play time so that the older ones can leave, and this happening every month is really bad.
 I can see tough why that decision was made, since in many games that involve a ranking system once you reach a high enough ranking queue times will take forever and hinder players from enjoying the game. This certainly happened here and they tried to fix it, but, in my opinion, they did it in an awkward way. My sugestionwould be to actually use the PLAYER LEVEL to determine who you are allowed to play with or create a diferent kind of game mode outside of the ranking system that uses the player level, instead of leaving it just to how much store cash you get. 

All in all, Dead by daylight is a fun game with a somewhat questionable community (like any other game), with one major problem that in order to fix will probably displease a lot of people, but unless its done i will recomend new players to give it a try 1-2 weeks after rank reset, that being from day 15 to the end of the month.

Понимаю когда дают бан тем кто намеренно выходит из катки, но не тогда когда ты блин нормально играешь, почти заканчиваешь игру а тебя просто выкидывает. Надеюсь со временем это как нибудь решиться. В принципе игрой доволен, но вот ее ошибками нет. Попробовать стоит.

I bought this game on a whim because it was on sale and I was interested in the genre. It became one of my highest played games on Steam. Fun as both survivor and killer, with friends or solo play. The ranking system does a decent job of matching similarly skilled players and lobbies fill up quick. You can collect currency to buy DLC characters to expand your rosters without paying extra money. The developers are actively working to improve the game and communicate with the players through devstreams. The game goes on sale frequently so you can pick it up for cheap. The iconic slasher killers are well done and faithful to their source material. Are you still reading this? Go buy the game already!
игра огонь такие игры делаються рас в 20лет

Coming back to this game reminds me why nobody likes playing at high ranks. It's a huge cancerfest of getting looped on pallets while the other 3 buddies work on gens. Not only is this tedious and annoying, it's just not fun really, and I can only imagine how many times Survivors can rinse and repeat the same old pattern before getting bored out of their minds.
The devs still have a huge detachment as to how much time they think Killers have and the reality of how much time they actually have, which is next to no time at all to be playing pallet looping for 2 minutes against a half-decent team. Sure, you can break off the chase and go patrol your generators, but what good does that do you when you've accomplished essentially nothing during your chase while the other 3 are working? Everybody knows the meta - it hasn't changed in years - and none of the old popular players like the meta which is exactly why they left.

I just want the old DBD back in the pre-Nurse patch. Keep the QOL stuff, keep jungle gyms nerfed to hell, and for fuck's sake, bring back the Billy flick we used to love.

31/01/2019 -- Comprei este jogo recentemente, porém é um jogo extremamente divertido, principalmente se estiver jogando com os amigos. Pois o objetiovo dele é de fugir de um monstro, porém, para isso deve concertar 5 geradores que permitirá você de abrir um portão ou fugir por um alçapão. Ele é muito tenso quando você está fugindo do monsto, pois tem uma musíca muito frenética. Até agora não percebi nenhum bug que atrabalhe o game.

杀机三连.jpg

1 无网络连接 {{黎明杀机}}服务器当前不可用。请稍后重试。
2 离开游戏 游戏版本无效请更新为有效版本。
3 队伍创建失败 你无法创建队伍，因为你已在队伍中。
4 无法连接到主机 无法连接到游戏主机。请检查你的网络设置（NAT类型）。如果问题依然存在，请尝试加入不同的房间。
5 保存出错 发生错误，游戏无法保存你的用户配置文件，请重启游戏。
6 离开游戏 EAC反外挂软件客户端无法被实例化。
7 错误 发生了未知错误。
8 队伍创建失败 未能创建队伍。
9 初始化出现错误 游戏初始化错误，可能无法正常存档，请尝试重启游戏解决问题。
10 保存游戏出错 无法读取保存的游戏。
11 玩家账户等级出错 发生错误，游戏无法更新你的玩家账户等级，请重启游戏。
12 连接错误 无法连接至在线服务，请稍后重试。 错误代码8012
13 错误 无法连接至主办者房间，请重试。
14 社交功能不可用 部分社交功能不可用。
15 已从服务器上断开 由于无法通过反作弊检测程序校验主办者的账户，你已从服务器上断开（错误代码2）

I love this game! Its fun and exiting to play for both killer and survivor. Of course there are somethings that need improving like dedicated servers to stop lag switching and the hatch standoff is broken so it wastes a lot much time. Other then that the game is constantly updated and every new map is free. The progession keeps you playing with events all the time for extra cosmedics. Would recommend.
this game really needs a casual mode or penalty to those who leave mid game or dont connect.

갈고리 저항 연타하다가 키보드 부숴지겠음 그냥 꾹 누르는걸로 바꿔야됨 그리고 랭크인가 레벨 뭐시기때문에 지금 살인마 하면 큐 안잡힘 근데 생존자하면 빨리 잡힘 생존마라곤 하지만 난 살인마한테서 도망칠수가없음 아무리 뛰어도 잡힘

It's fun sometimes, but typically very aggravating. The dev team does an extremely bad job balancing the Killers/Survivors, which is going to be difficult in the first place, but they don't listen to their community. They end up buffing all the wrong things and nerfing the already nerfed. You will be farmed by teammates, you will be tunneled by Killers and occassionally you will be camped and there's no real penalty to doing any of the listed toxicity. In certain situations, it's understandable to do one of the stated actions, but it shouldn't be shined on. 

The game itself still feels like it's in Early Access. Shitty FPS issues on specific maps, loads of bugs that can make your game experience horrible. Matchmaking works most of the time, but not all the time. Matchmaking however, is probably the only feature in the game that's not that bad. This game has yet to implement dedicated servers, so if you're an USWest player, prepare to play against people with 200+ Ping and get hit after vaulting when the killer was nowhere near you. Yay fun!!

It's worth $5.99, but not $19.99.

杀鸡我记得跟当时刚出的守望先锋一样红红火火的，当时我由于网络问题所以就没继续玩，后来这游戏莫名其妙的退出了大家的视线了，后来网易出了个第五人格，我一看这不就是杀鸡吗，然后这游戏还火了，我就奇怪为什么杀鸡火不了但是第五人格却火了
game is gooooood
为了摆脱野蛮杀手的杀害，需要队友齐力合作，修复机器，拯救队友，开启逃生之门，游戏设计精益，画面逼真如临其境，音效动感，是一部锻炼自己生存恐怖游戏，气氛良佳，只要奋力逃生忘记什么是恐怖，很现实主义，生活也是如此努力工作就会忘记身边的一切，是一部浪漫主义求生恐怖游戏值得开完值得推荐。
